mapper.sql: (CASE info.grade WHEN 1 THEN '高一' WHEN 2 THEN '高二' WHEN 3 THEN '高三' end) as grade, info.icon as imageUrl, detail.contact_person as customerName, detail.question_desc as questionDesc, CONCAT(province.`name`,IFNULL(city.`name`,''),IFNULL(county.`name`,'')) as 地址, (CASE if(info.provinceId=610000,null,info.subjectType) WHEN 0 THEN '文史' WHEN 1 THEN '理工' END) as majorTypeName, info.schoolName as schoolName, (CASE info.sex WHEN 1 THEN '男' WHEN 0 THEN '女' end) as sex
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zgk_expert_reservation_order_detail detail INNER join zgk_user_info info ON detail.user_id = info.id LEFT join zgk_province province ON info.provinceId=province.id LEFT JOIN zgk_city city ON city.id = info.cityId LEFT join zgk_county county ON county.id = info.id where detail.id = #{orderId}

SELECT course. NAME AS apeskName, course.ac_id AS acId, apesk.report_id AS reportId, apesk.report_date AS reportDate FROM zgk_expert_reservation_order_detail detail INNER JOIN ( SELECT max(id) AS id, user_id, ac_id FROM zgk_apesk WHERE state = 0 GROUP BY ac_id, user_id ) temp ON detail.user_id = temp.user_id INNER JOIN zgk_apesk apesk ON apesk.id = temp.id INNER JOIN zgk_apesk_course course ON apesk.ac_id = course.ac_id WHERE detail.user_id = #{orderId}
